_meanings:
{@--1@} Standing,
staying, being situated (at the end
of <ab>comp.</ab>).

A 
lasting or permanent feeling; (see  
{#sTAyiBAva#} below); <ls>Śi. 2. 87.</ls>

Anything
lasting, a permanent state or 
condition.

a fixed or 
permanent condition of mind, a 
lasting or permanent feeling; (these
feelings being said to give rise to
the different {%rasas%} or sentiments
in poetry, each {%rasa%} having its own
Sthāyibhāva); they are eight or
nine; {#ratirhAsaSca SokaSca kroDotsAhO BayaM#}
{#taTA . jugupsA vismayaScetTamazwO proktaH#}
{#Samo'pi ca#} <ls>S. D. 206</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab>  
{#vyaBicAriBAva, BAva, viBAva#} also.
